remarks: Move substitution into a class abstraction.  Version of ~ csbopabgALT without a sethood antecedent but depending on more axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by NM, 23-Aug-2018.)
statement:
csbopab $p |- [_ A / x ]_ { <. y , z >. | ph } = { <. y , z >. | [. A / x ]. ph } $.
$d A y z $.
$d x y z $.
